description: The sea train connecting Water 7 to Enies Lobby, designed by Tom. In this episode, it serves as the mobile battlefield where the Straw Hats attempt to rescue Robin from CP9.

keyEvents.title: Sogeking Uses Octopus Shoes on Train Side
keyEvents.description: Sogeking walks along the side of the speeding Puffing Tom using octopus shoes to reach Robin's window.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous conditions aboard the moving train and Sogeking's determination to reach Robin.

keyEvents.title: Sogeking Reaches Robin
keyEvents.description: Sogeking successfully traverses the exterior of the train and makes contact with Robin by tapping on her window.
keyEvents.significance: First direct contact between a Straw Hat crew member and Robin since her capture.

statusHistory.reason: The Puffing Tom is operational and traveling to Enies Lobby during this episode

name.japanese: パッフィング・トム 4号車

description: The fourth car of the Puffing Tom sea train, featuring a kitchen area. This car becomes the battleground for Sanji's fight against Wanze and his Ramen Kenpo.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Wanze Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: Sanji volunteers to stay behind in Car 4 to fight Wanze while Franky and Sogeking proceed forward.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the main battle of the episode in the kitchen setting.

keyEvents.title: Men's Formal Suit Deployed
keyEvents.description: Wanze creates his ultimate ramen armor technique in the confines of Car 4, filling much of the space with noodles.
keyEvents.significance: The kitchen setting becomes crucial to both fighters' strategies.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Uses Kitchen Knives
keyEvents.description: Taking advantage of the kitchen setting, Sanji borrows knives from Wanze and uses his culinary skills as combat techniques.
keyEvents.significance: The kitchen environment enables Sanji to justify using his hands and knives, treating the battle as cooking rather than fighting.

statusHistory.reason: Car 4 is operational as part of the Puffing Tom during the journey to Enies Lobby

name.japanese: パッフィング・トム 屋根

description: The roof of the Puffing Tom sea train, an extremely dangerous battlefield due to the high-speed movement and exposure to wind and elements. The setting for Franky's battle against Nero.

keyEvents.title: Franky vs Nero Rooftop Battle
keyEvents.description: Franky engages CP9's Nero in combat on the dangerous rooftop of the speeding train.
keyEvents.significance: The precarious rooftop setting adds extra danger to the battle, showcasing both fighters' agility and combat skills.

keyEvents.title: Rooftop Combat Techniques
keyEvents.description: Both Franky and Nero demonstrate techniques suited for the unstable rooftop environment, with Nero using Rokushiki to maintain balance and dodge.
keyEvents.significance: Shows how the environment influences combat strategy, with Nero's Geppo and Kami-e particularly suited for the rooftop setting.

statusHistory.reason: The rooftop is accessible during the train's journey to Enies Lobby
